oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Managing trials and reporting data for CIMMYT's international maize testing program
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Plant breeding
Disease resistance
Rusts
Progeny testing
Zea mays

Trials
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This publication provides detailed information and guidelines on trial management and data collection for the various types of trials that make up CIMMYT's international maize testing program. These are distributed to some 80 countries. Also included is a section on seed health that describes the precautions taken to ensure that maize germplasm received and distributed by the Center is disease free. All participants in the testing program and other persons requesting CIMMYT germplasm receive this booklet.
